terms_of_use_and_privacy_text:
acceptable use of our services
Terms and policies. You must use our services in accordance with the posted terms and policies. If you violate our Terms or Policy, we may take action with respect to your account, including disabling or suspending your account, and if we do, you agree not to create another account without our permission. Your account will be disabled or suspended in accordance with the Termination section below.

Legal and acceptable use. You must access and use our Services only for legal, approved and acceptable purposes. You may not use (or help others use) our Services in ways that: (a) violate, misappropriate, or infringe the rights of WhatsApp, our users, or others, including privacy rights, rights of publicity, or other intellectual property rights; (b) is illegal, immoral, defamatory, threatening, intimidating, harassing, or incites racial or ethnic hatred, or incites or encourages illegal or inappropriate behavior, such as promoting violent crime, endangering children or others; or exploiting them or conspiring to cause harm; (c) allow participation in the dissemination of falsehoods, distorted information or misleading statements; (d) impersonate a person; (e) allow you to engage in the transmission of information through illegal or unauthorized means of communication such as bulk messages, auto-messages, auto-solicitations, and the like; or (f) allow you to engage in non-personal use of our Services without our consent.
